globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://unpkg.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' https: data: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://lottie.host; media-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
